name: Flip (itch) (Chengzan Dong)
description:
RMIT MAGI Folio Works. 

It's a co-op game needs players control one character together.

Currently can only support one controller input for red player. The blue one needs keyboard input.

Player 1 (Blue): 

Keyboard only

When downside:

    Move: A/D

    Jump: J

When upside:

    Grab:(hold) J

    Flip: K

    Adjust Grab Length: W/S

==============================

Player 1 (Blue): 

Keyboard or Controller

When downside: 

    Move: Left/Right  or   Left stick

    Jump:  Right Control or  A 

When upside:

    Grab:(hold)  Right Control or  A

    Flip: Right Shift or  X 

    Adjust Grab Length: Up/down or  Left stick up/down
